markdown.headingText: **2026** \| Bioinformática aplicada al análisis de expresión génica diferencial
markdown.markdown:
[scRNA-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-success}

-   **Fechas:** 11, 18 y 25 marzo, 8, 15 y 22 de abril, 2026
-   **Localización:** UNAM, campus Juriquilla, Querétaro
-   **Actividad:** Instructora
-   **Github:**
-   **Organizado por:** PROGRAMA DE POSGRADO, MAESTRÍA EN CIENCIAS (NEUROBIOLOGÍA)

### **2026** \| Minería Genómica Bacteriana: Identificación de genes de producción y resistencia antimicrobiana

[Genetic Mining]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-danger}

-   **Fechas:** 29-30 de abril, 2025
-   **Localización:** LIIGH-UNAM, Querétaro
-   **Actividad:** Instructora y ayudante

-   **Lenguaje:** Español

### **2024** \| Analyzing PBMCs Single Cell ATAC- Seq (scATAC-Seq) and Multiome data: Theory and practice

[scATAC-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-secondary}

-   **Date:** 11 November, 2024
-   **Venue:** Universidad CES, Medellín, Colombia
-   **Activity:** Organizer and Instructor
-   **Github:** [Tutorial scATACseq](https://github.com/EveliaCoss/Tutorial_ISCB_LATAM_scATACseq)
-   **Book/Resource:** [Analyzing PBMCs Single Cell ATAC- Seq (scATAC-Seq) and Multiome data: Theory and practice](https://eveliacoss.github.io/Tutorial_ISCB_LATAM_scATACseq/)
-   **Organizer:** [Wellcome Connecting Science](https://coursesandconferences.wellcomeconnectingscience.org/event/single-cell-genomic-approaches-to-study-the-immune-system-latin-america-the-caribbean-20241109/)
-   **Language:** English

### **2024** \| Single Cell Genomic Approaches to Study the Immune System - Latin America & the Caribbean

[scRNA-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-success} [CITE-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-warning} [scATAC-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-secondary} [Immune receptors]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-info}

-   **Dates:** 9-11 November, 2024
-   **Venue:** Universidad CES, Medellín, Colombia
-   **Activity:** Organizer and Helper
-   **Github:** [Single Cell Genomic Approaches to Study the Immune System - Latin America & the Caribbean](https://github.com/WCSCourses/Single_Cell_Genomics_ImmuneSys_24)
-   **Organizer:** [Wellcome Connecting Science](https://coursesandconferences.wellcomeconnectingscience.org/event/single-cell-genomic-approaches-to-study-the-immune-system-latin-america-the-caribbean-20241109/)
-   **Language:** English

### **2023** \| CDSB 2023: Creando paquetes de R/Bioconductor para análisis transcriptómicos de célula única

[scRNA-seq]{.badge .rounded-pill .bg-success}

-   **Localización:** Virtual event
-   **Actividad:** Instructora

-   **Organizado por:** CDSB
-   **Lenguaje:** Español
